resources.string: Generate Combined Video File on Stop
FFmpeg is not supported on your device

* When checked, a combined video file will be generated in background after you stop recording. This will take a very long time and consume a significant amount of power to complete.

* Only one combining action can exist in background. If you consecutively record videos with this option checked, only your last recording will be combined.

Are you sure to continue?

This app is still under development.

Developer: Su Yan
Tester: Qi Zhong

Please visit http://www.ueseo.net/mobile-video-recorder.html for help.
